title: Officium Triste - Charcoal Hearts - 15 Years Of Hurt (2009) [mp3
description:
Artist: Officium Triste
Album: Charcoal Hearts - 15 Years Of Hurt [best of/compilation]
Release: May 15th, 2009
Genre: Death/Doom Metal
Country: Netherlands  (Rotterdam, South Holland) 
Format: mp3@CBR192kbps
Total playing time: 51:10

Tracklist:
1. No Hope (6:32)
2. Divinity (6:39)
3. My Charcoal Heart (acoustic version) (5:02)
4. Love Like Blood (5:28)
5. Fading Like A Dying Candle (7:24)
6. Downfall (Through The Veils Of Grey) (7:58)
7. Intro: Officium Triste Part II (1:29)
8. Mountains Of Depressiveness (5:21)
9. Dreams Of Sorrow (5:17)


Tracks 5-6: From the split w/ Cold Mourning (1998)
Tracks 7-9: Mountains of Depressiveness EP (1996)

Current line-up
Pim Blankenstein - Vocals (Beyond Belief)
Bram Bijlhout - Guitars (Imbolc (Hol), Absent Mind, Throned (Hol), Darkside (Hol))
Gerard - Guitars
Lawrence Mayer - Bass (Liar of Golgotha)
Martin Kwakernaak - Synths (formerly Drums too)
Ronald Lagerwaard - Drums (Imbolc (Hol), Absent Mind, Perpetual Misery)

15 years anniversary compilation.


All references to the music, placed above, are presented only for fact-finding listening .. so if you like it - buy it !
